attributes.action: switch government ministers over to so called environmentally friendly vehicles for transport in and around London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time the government showed it believed it's own rhetoric about humanity causing global warming by changing from using Jaguars to the so called environmentally friendly vehicles such as the Prius or perhaps the G-Wiz which it is fervently attempting to drive the rest of us to use.
